Class PhysicalSend

java.lang.Object
  niagara.optimizer.colombia.Op
      niagara.optimizer.colombia.PhysicalOp

                  niagara.physical.PhysicalSend
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.lang.Runnable, Initializable, Instrumentable, Schedulable, SchemaProducer, SerializableToXML
public class PhysicalSend
extends UnoptimizablePhysicalOperator

This is the PhysicalSendOperator that extends the basic PhysicalOperator with the implementation of the Send operator.
